      • toCQLLiteral

        public java.lang.String toCQLLiteral(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Generates CQL literal for TEXT/VARCHAR/ASCII types. Caveat: it does only generate literals with single quotes and not pg-style literals.
        Specified by:
